text: Absolutely love this laptop! The performance for competitive gaming is incredible, especially the NVIDIA GTX 1660. Boots up super fast and handles everything I throw at it. The screen brightness is also top-notch. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a beast like the AERO 15 SA-7US2130SH FHD 240 Hz i7-9750H NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660 Ti 6 GB GDDR6 16 GB RAM 512 GB M.2 PCIe SSD Win 10 Gaming Laptop!

Fantastic gaming laptop for the price. Getting amazing FPS in Fortnite and Apex Legends. The build quality of the AERO 15 SA-7US2130SH FHD 240 Hz i7-9750H NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1660 Ti 6 GB GDDR6 16 GB RAM 512 GB M.2 PCIe SSD Win 10 Gaming Laptop is solid, and the battery life is a joy to use. A definite 5 stars!

A definite 5 stars!
